### 介绍


### 代码
```{r}
som <- function(x) {
  # 定义功能
  switch(x,                 # 对 X 进行赋值，定义
  "1" = "sing",             # 1 代表 sing
  "2" = "dance",            # 2 代表 dance
  "3" = "taletelling",      # 3 代表讲故事
  "4" = "pick one up",      # 4 代表 pick one up
  "5" = "make a face",      # 5 代表 make a face
  "6" = "drinking"          # 6 代表 drinking
  )
}
```

### 演示
```{r}
som(sample(1:6, 1)) # 从 1 到 6 中随机抽取一个数，运行程序
som(sample(1:6, 1))
som(sample(1:6, 1))
```
